trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brownwood
There was one other sighting in Brownwood on or around January 8th 2008
Summary: Witness driving in car saw five (5) large bright yellow lights in the sky that moved to form one even row the blinked out.
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness A, her Mom and younger brother were driving home about 7:10 p.m. on the 8th of January 2008. They topped a small hill and saw big scattered blinking lights in front of them very close to the ground. The stopped the car and watched the lights blink on and off a few times. Then the lights lined up in front of them in a row and blinked out. The lights were a bright yellow, very large and very bright.
